regularCycle() - Method in class statemachine.StateMachineCycleTest
 
RemoteConnection - Class in communication
Sets up a remote connection to a second nxt brick with the lejos.nxt.remote class, this allows the main brick to have access to the sensors on the slave brick See Example for how to implement: http://fedora.cis.cau.edu/~pmolnar/CIS687F12/Programming-LEGO-Robots/samples/src/org/lejos/sample/remotenxttest/RemoteNXTTest.java
RemoteConnection() - Constructor for class communication.RemoteConnection
Exists to defeat instantiation to ensure singleton

rotateToRelatively(double) - Method in class movement.Driver
rotate to the angle wrt to the current robot angle.
rotateToRelatively(double, boolean) - Method in class movement.Driver
Deprecated. since this method will return right away and will not wait for the rotation to finish we must manually call the Driver.motorStop() method to ensure the motorStopped flag is set correctly. also note that Driver.isTurning() will never return true when this method is called also due to the return right away property. use the single parameter Driver.rotateToRelatively(double) if you do not need to return right away
